history.narrative: Law 4-43 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-156, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations and the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 14, 1981, and July 28, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 6, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-78 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
